response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value to me. This unique item is not just an object but a symbol of excellence and craftsmanship. I believe its true worth far exceeds $1,500,000, reflecting its unparalleled quality and significance.

I am extending to you the chance to own this masterpiece at a special introductory price of $1,800,000. This offer is exclusive to you and represents a significant saving compared to its market value. My hope is that you will appreciate the product's true worth and see the value it can bring to your life or collection.

Please let me know if you would like to discuss this further or if you have any questions about the product. I am more than happy to provide additional information to help you make an informed decision.

Looking forward to your response,
Alice", "product_price": 1800000}
